title: The Writer's Almanac - Sunday, September 20, 2020
description: It's the birthday of George R.R. Martin (1948), author of the series "A Song of Ice and Fire" which was turned into the HBO show "Game of Thrones."
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It's the birthday of George R.R. Martin (1948), author of the series "A Song of Ice and Fire" which was turned into the HBO show "Game of Thrones."
